price: 22 Il sera ordonné : « Que les impies et leurs semblables[1141] soient rassemblés, ainsi que tout ce qu’ils adoraient
arabic: ۞ ٱحۡشُرُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ وَأَزۡوَٰجَهُمۡ وَمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: uḥ'shurū alladhīna ẓalamū wa-azwājahum wamā kānū yaʿbudūna
